translations: 先见之明；（枪的）前准星；前视

sentences.sentence: Senile old man with out any foresights.
Annie: People then had aesthetic foresights. It would be strange if the human body set off with shinning olive oil and it was not hand-some!
sentences.translation: 安妮：那时的人们就很有审美眼光，人体本身的美，再加上油光闪闪的橄榄油的衬托，不健美才怪呢！
